message: For example, I just joined a new group and I want to ask a question. However, before I ask that question i want to know if someone else already has. Currently, I do not see a way for me to search through all of the current topics to see if my question has already been asked/answered.
still, it'll be hard to beat: http://bit.ly/ehgcwL - especially for relevance
sorry @gregparadee, someone has already asked that: https://convore.com/feedback/search-robustification/57630/ :-P
Like I said would be an awesome feature lol
